note.p: Education: Christ's Hospital; Pembroke College, Cambridge. LLD

Career: Regius Professor of Civil Law, Cambridge (1847-1854); called to the Bar (1850); Member of Indian Council (1862-1869); Corpus Christi Professor of Jurisprudence, Oxford (1869); Master of Trinity Hall, Cambridge (1877-1888); died of apoplexy
Notes: Second citation added in Selbourne's hand in list of proposers
